fields.label: Mode
fields.description: Choose WhatsApp integration mode: 'Unofficial' uses free WhatsApp Web via NodeJS service, 'Official' uses paid Meta Business API

fields.label: Legacy NodeJS API URL (Not Required)
fields.description: This field is no longer required. WhatsApp integration now uses Python service built into Frappe. You can leave this blank.

fields.label: Business Phone Number ID
fields.description: Get this from Meta Developer Console > WhatsApp > API Setup. Format: 123456789012345

fields.label: Meta Access Token
fields.description: Permanent access token from Meta Developer Console. Get from WhatsApp > API Setup > Access Token

fields.label: Webhook Verify Token
fields.description: Custom token for webhook verification. Set same value in Meta Developer Console webhook configuration
